articles.author: Patrick Hipes
articles.title: Dustin Lance Black’s UK Assault Case Dismissed - Deadline
articles.description: A UK assault trial for Oscar-winning screenwriter Dustin Lance Black was dismissed by a judge Wednesday after the trial got underway. The judge, Louisa Ciecióra of Westminster Magistrates’ Co…
articles.content:
A UK assault trial for Oscar-winning screenwriter Dustin Lance Black was dismissed by a judge Wednesday after the trial got underway.
